description: Compact code that classifies a vehicle part into a standard category for inventory control, maintenance planning, and reporting; also used to map to external catalogs or integrations.
Readable name for the category used in user interfaces, search, and reports; provides context for the code.
Indicates whether the category is retired and should not be used for new parts or work orders; retained for historical records and audits.
Internal unique identifier (numeric surrogate key) for the category, used as the primary key and referenced by related part and maintenance records.
